title: MDMA
summary: 3,4-Methyl​enedioxy​methamphetamine (MDMA), commonly known as ecstasy, E, or molly, is a psychoactive drug primarily used for recreational purposes.[14] The desired effects include altered sensations, increased energy, empathy, as well as pleasure.[14][15] When taken by mouth, effects begin in 30 to 45 minutes and last 3 to 6 hours.[12][16]
